page.title: 04The People - occupations
page.content: The area contains people with a wide variety of occupations including Doctors, Bank managers,Factory Inspectors,solicitors,seamen, Accountants,Mechanics,Professional Footballers,Insurance Agents, Shop-keepers,Teachers,Salesmen, Nurses,Farmers,Drivers,Office workers,factory-workers,Farmers, Auctioneers,Policemen,Publicans and clergymen as well as many others including retired people. The majority of these people have to travel to work in Carlisle though a few work locally and in Brampton and Longtown.The bus service is very infrequent and consequently most people use their own transport i.e.cars, motorcycles or pedal cycles.
